changeSet.author: jcarvaja
changeSet.comment: All existing billable_usage_remittance older than October 1 where status='pending' or status is null are updated to have status='unknown'.
changeSet.sql: update billable_usage_remittance set status = 'unknown' where (status is null or status = 'pending') and remittance_pending_date < TO_TIMESTAMP('2024-10-01 0:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
